headline: Intuitive Surgical, Inc. (ISRG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Intuitive Surgical, Inc. (ISRG) on PitchStack Investing’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ISRG. Intuitive Surgical, Inc. (ISRG)’s share was trading at $513 as of 12th June. ISRG’s trailing and forward P/E were 76.49 and 67.11 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Intuitive Surgical stands as […]

headline: cultivate(MD) Announces Portfolio Company, Virtual Incision Corporation, Appoints Jim Alecxih as Chief Executive Officer
summary: cultivate(MD), a leading medical device venture capital company, is pleased to announce that its portfolio company, Virtual Incision Corporation, the developer of the MIRA Surgical System authorized by the FDA through the De Novo regulatory pathway, has appointed Jim Alecxih as Chief Executive Officer. Alecxih, a recognized commercial leader in the medical device industry, brings more than 30 years of experience advancing transformative surgical technologies worldwide, including a distinguished
